Keep the system in balance - do not let the needles enter the red zone. Radiativity will constantly decline, use the buttons on the desk (or A-G on your keypad) to balance!

Flow Rate: 
Required flow rate will move regularly. Use the lever to adjust the valve and maintain proper flow.
The Vacuum Pump toggle next to the button activates an additional system. Other maintenance options come on line, BUT the plant is more sensitive to lever movements

Oscilliscope: 
Click and drag the crank to modify the waveform to match the red line. Watch out for the waveforms getting too far out of alignment!

Numpad: 
Enter the code from the printout by clicking the number keys.
